name: litvinenko/app
description: General-purpose Litvinenko\Common\App class that can dispatch events in Magento style (see http://www.solvingmagento.com/event-driven-architecture-in-magento-observer-pattern/ or http://codegento.com/2011/04/observers-and-dispatching-events/) and create singletones in Magento style (see http://inchoo.net/magento/making-use-of-magento-getsingleton-method/)
